attributes.action: Reduce the number of people claiming benefits as their main income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are a drain on the tax payer and tend to have no imputus to gain employment, we should not be paying them to sit at home or in the pub. They have a higher standard of living than many hard working citizens! How can that be RIGHT???

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
